title: Login Error after updating patch
body:
I can't seem to login into my main account. I've tried numerous attempts to login, but I keep getting the Login Error.
Is this happening to anyone else? I asked one of my friends earlier and they say that they can login just fine.

replies.body:
That's really strange. If this is still going on, it's possible there's a security problem or a drop in your connection before it hits the server. I recommend working through our [login issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if you continue to have issues with this.
